You're on your way to making an awesome game!
Now open the Variables tray.
Drag the block onto your code space...

...and connect it to this block.
This will put the paddle on the left of the canvas.

Now let's use a lerp block to tweak the Sensor data.
Open the Math tray.
Drag the block onto your code space.
Connect it to this block.

Now move the paddle to the bottom of the canvas.
Change 200 to 280.

OK, it's time to add your Sensor.
Open the Motion tray.
Drag the block onto your code space...
...and connect it to this block.

Move your hand over the Sensor...
Does the Paddle move?
Great! Now let's make it interact with the ball.
Open the Events tray (you know what these blocks are for).
Drag the block onto your code space...
...and drop it anywhere.

Now let's make the ball bounce back when it hits the paddle.
Open the Variables tray.
Drag the block onto your code space...
...and connect it to this block.
Change item to ballSpeedX.
Open the Variables tray again.
Drag the block onto your code space.
Connect it to this block.

Now let's send the ball back to the right.
Change 0 to 5.
Move your hand over the sensor and try to bounce the ball back.
Woohoo! Next, let's take it to the next level and add the score!
